Module scheduling_app.mattmullinsc195
Package Controllers

Class AddCustomerController

java.lang.Object
Controllers.AddCustomerController
public class AddCustomerController extends Object
This class is the controller for the addCustomers.fxml file. It is used to add a new customer to the database.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize() throws SQLException
      This method is used to initialize the Add Customer screen. It populates the country and division combo boxes.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • countryComboAction

      public void countryComboAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      This method contains the logic for the Country Combo Box. It populates the division combo box based on the country selected.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • divisionComboAction

      public void divisionComboAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method contains the logic for the Division Combo Box. It sets the divisionID based on the division selected.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • saveCustomerAction

      public void saveCustomerAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method contains the logic for the Save Customer Button. It saves the new customer to the database using the information entered in the text fields. The screen change lambda expression is used to change the screen to the main screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      IOException

    • addCustCancelAction

      public void addCustCancelAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method is used to cancel adding a new customer. The screen change lambda expression is used to change the screen to the main screen. No data is saved to the database.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      IOException

    • addCustomerExceptionHandling

      public void addCustomerExceptionHandling()
      This method is used to handle exceptions when the user does not enter data in all the fields.
